slide-1.title: How to Play
content:
Shio Fights is a unique card game with a Chinese Zodiac theme.
In each round of this game, two shio will be matched against each other, and the winner will be determined based on the rank of each Shio.

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: After the betting period ends, the Dealer will deal one card each for Di (Earth) and Tian (Heaven)

slide-3.title: Winning
content: The result is determined by card rankings: <b>Rat is the highest, Pig is the lowest. Rat only loses to Pig, and Pig only wins against Rat.<b/>
